title: Executive Order 5517-Chugach National Forest, Alaska
content: Under authority of the act of Congress approved June 4, 1897 (30 Stat. 34-36), and on the recommendation of the Secretary of Agriculture, it is hereby ordered that the tract of land in Alaska lying within the following described boundaries, heretofore occupied as a home site, be, and the same is hereby, excluded from the Chugach National Forest and restored to entry under the applicable public land laws:
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5517-Chugach National Forest, Alaska Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361159
